about_the_game: Step into the foggy streets of Victorian London and follow Thomas, a daring young detective, as he races to uncover the truth behind his best friend Emily's mysterious disappearance. With his loyal companion George by his side, he unravels a web of secrets: a murder, a sinister laboratory, and a shipwreck conspiracy. The journey is fraught with peril as the company faces threats from ruthless criminals, who harbor sins of their tragic past and deadly motives. Will Thomas be able to save his friend and bring the villains to justice, or will the shadows of Victorian London claim another victim? In this thrilling hidden-object game, the answers lie at your fingertips.
